moves.1. e4 c5 2. Bc4 e6 3. Nc3 Nc6 4. Nf3 Nf6:
Very well played up to now. 
You have to continue your development. I would suggest 8.d4
moves.11... Bd6 12. Re1 Re8 13. g3: This is a weak move because you open the Kings defence whitout cause. You had to consider the manouevre Nf2 follewed by Nd3 (what you could have done on move 12 already)
moves.13... Bh3: I have a big positionally advantage now.
moves.14. Qd3: The Knight o c3 is doing nothing. Again you should have tried to bring it to the weakend Kind side. The centre is for black now.
The rest of the game is well played, but with an extra piece black will manage to win
